UI Design and Software Development

When I think of Brad, the first thing I think of is his passion for design. In our time together at General Dynamics, I watched him breathe new life into projects, making an immediate impact on their trajectory. His attention to detail and love for creating beautiful, clean user interfaces inspired everyone to care a little more and step up their game. He jumped head first into our team at GD, contributing to our culture, professionalism, and overall success. He knows his craft well and would be an asset contributing or leading any design team. Highly recommended.

Jeffrey Carpenter
Technical Evangelist @ DataStax
December 17, 2016, Jeffrey was senior to Brad but didn’t manage directly

I worked with Brad on an airspace management system for the US Army. On this project he demonstrated the ability to build camaraderie with our system users, using human-centered design techniques to understand their needs and pain points. He then used this knowledge to create intuitive and efficient UI/UX designs and refined these through multiple user evaluations. This work was a key factor in our team's success in modernizing a 10+ year old battlefield system for a new generation of soldiers, and it also helped keep an important contract for the company.

Lara Aldag
Senior Director of New Ventures at Amazon / Audible
December 13, 2016, Lara was a client of Brad’s

Brad is a highly talented User Experience designer whose consulting was integral to Higgle in the early days, and we continued to use his design principles as we grew and built the platform. He has a great ability to match the right UX method to solve a customer need. When given a problem to solve on his own, Brad would deliver and explain fantastic wires and mocks that explicitly solved the exact customer problem and enhanced the customer experience. I would strongly recommend Brad for any company that wants to advance their UX strategy and add a highly valuable member and design thought leader to their team.

summary: I am a designer with 12+ years experience specializing in User Experience and Graphic Design. I have a proven success record developing products and solutions, quickly and efficiently, on major projects with notable companies. My colleagues would describe me as a team player and leader that inspires others through hard work, creativity and a superior grasp on the technical side of design.I am proud to have served in the US Army supporting Operation Iraqi Freedom. At General Dynamics, I have the opportunity to combine my design experience and military experience to deliver a highly usable product to our soldiers.
name: Brad Shroyer
title: Senior UX Designer
